duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and implement integrations between VR platform and LMS systems for seamless data exchange and functionality.
Identify and implement best practices for single sign-on (SSO) across third-party systems.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design integration solutions for provisioning classrooms and user accounts.
Debug and resolve issues in integration solutions to ensure data accuracy and system stability.
Provide technical leadership, mentorship, and guidance to junior team members.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
